title: Priyanka Chopra catches the eye in plunging floral blouse with flowing white trousers
text:
Priyanka Chopra was once again a vision of style as she jetted into Million Air Burbank on Monday.

The actress, 37, had an air of confidence to her as she strutted outside rocking a sexy pair of clear high heels with a plunging red floral blouse.

Priyanka's low-cut blouse accentuated her fabulous figure, cinching perfectly into her waistline.

So fly! Priyanka Chopra was a vision in a plunging red floral blouse with white high-waist trousers as she jetted into Million Air Burbank on Monday

She teamed the top with a pair of baggy white trousers.

Priyanka also had an off-white purse slung over her shoulder, in addition to a pair of chic shades protecting her eyesight.

Enhancing her natural beauty, Priyanka wore a tint of berry-hued lipstick while stylishly parting her hair towards the side.

Walk this way: The actress turned heads in a flowing pair of trousers with clear high heels

Priyanka appeared to be flying solo for the day.

Not pictured with the Quantico actress was her husband of nearly one year, Nick Jonas.

The couple tied the knot in India in December 2018, meaning it won't be long until they will be celebrating their one year anniversary.

Flying solo: Chopra did not appear to be joined by her husband of one year, Nick Jonas

In addition to celebrating their big day, the pair are also thinking about starting their family.

Earlier this month, Priyanak revealed she and Nick 'really can't wait' to start a family together.

In an interview on the Today show, she said of parenthood: 'I can't wait. I really can't wait.

'I mean, there's so much that happens in our lives. Whenever God blesses us with that... it's something that we both definitely want.'
description: The actress, 37, was a vision in a plunging red floral blouse with white high-waist trousers as she jetted into Million Air Burbank on Monday. Priyanka had an air of confidence to her.
